DOC.HEADLINE: VALLEYWIDE FOCUS : SIMI VALLEY ; VOLUNTEERS SOUGHT TO REPAIR HOMES
DOC.TEXT: Habitat for Humanity of Ventura County , a nonprofit organization that provides housing for low-income families , is seeking volunteers to help repair homes damaged in the Jan . 17 earthquake . Volunteers are needed to help with construction and manage projects . The agency is also seeking office space and equipment . Those wishing to volunteer or make donations can attend the agency ' s weekly meeting at 7:30 p.m. Wednesday at Simi Covenant Church , 4680 Alamo St. , Simi Valley , or call Kathy Sube at ( 805 ) 532-7265 or Jerry DeVillers at ( 805 ) 482-7132 . SARA CATANIA
